templates.content: Sorry about that! Bulk pricing applies to the quantity of heads made from the same photo. For example, if you upload one photo, select your options, and choose a quantity of 2, the bulk pricing will apply. However, if you upload one photo and create a head, then upload a second photo and create another head, single-piece pricing applies to each one.
templates.name: Why Is Bulk Pricing Not Available for Separate Photos?

templates.content: The sticks we use for the 12" BigHeads are 8" long.
templates.name: How long are the sticks on our 12" BigHeads?

templates.content: Our facility is in La Crosse, WI.
templates.name: Where are you located?

templates.content: If you want separate standees for each person, you can simply create 5 standees from our website and use this photo for each one. You'll have to do it 5 times. Right after the upload, you will come to a page where you select the height. On this page is a "Special Instructions" section. Simply type a note like "use the first person on the right" to identify one of the people for each standee.
templates.name: I want multiple standees using one photo

templates.content: You'll find the discount box at checkout. If you're on a desktop you'll see it at the right side of your screen when you enter your shipping details. If you're using a phone, you'll find the discount box at the very bottom of the checkout page. Simply scroll to the bottom and you will see the entry box and the redeem button. Let me know if you can't find it.
templates.name: Where do I add the discount? - brand specific

templates.content: Yes, we offer a text option. Upload your photo and in Step 3, select "Add Text". Enter the text and then select if you want a speech bubble, thought bubble, or sign.
templates.name: Can I add text / word to the sign?

templates.content: We don't offer reviews directly on the website but you can leave one on our Facebook page here: https://www.facebook.com/CardboardCutoutStandees/ If you prefer, we can provide links for BBB or our business page on Google. Just let me know!
templates.name: How can I submit a review?

templates.content: All of our sign, speech bubble, and thought bubble options can be covered with Dry Erase. You can select this option after you choose the sign type.
templates.name: Can I have the sign made of material where I can erase the message?

templates.content: We find that the best photos for BigHeads are headshots. Although group photos can be utilized they often don't produce the best results due to the photos resolution being spread over the entire group and not focused on the individual.
templates.name: If I send a group picture can you cutout each persons head?(BigHeads)

templates.content:
If you're able to find a body you would like to use (instructions below), you can use the image you want to use for the body to place your order through the online ordering system. 

You'll need to select additional Photo Editing (there is a $20 fee for this), and let us know in the special instructions that you'd like to do a head swap. You'll then need to reply to your email confirmation with the face image you would like to use within one hour of placing your order. 

To find a body, we would recommend trying to find an image with at least 2800 pixels within the height of the subject matter within the image. Here is a link to a video that teaches how to search for high resolution images using Google: https://youtu.be/kvTQPvkxv-o
templates.name: Can you edit my head on another person's body?

templates.content: Shipping is calculated based on items ordered and the ship-to zip code. If you have the cart ready to go, you can apply a shipping city, state, and zip and receive a shipping quote right from the site.
templates.name: How much is shipping?

templates.content:
Face Hole or Face-In-Hole standees are great for photos.  To order this style of cutout simply upload your photo and select the height and material. Select the editing option and let us know what style of Face Hole cutout you would prefer. 

Leave "Panel Style Face In Hole" in the editing instructions if you would like us to leave in the background so your guests can stay hidden behind it during photos. Leave "Neck Scoop" in the editing instructions if you would like us to cutout the image as we would with a normal standee. This will allow your guest to "stand in" behind the standee and place their face over the cutout body. Here's a screenshot for reference: https://prnt.sc/Nvu4KfLdJsyZ
templates.name: How do I order a Face Hole standee?

templates.content: BigHeads are shipped in a box that will meet UPS size requirements. We may have to score the 24", 36", and 47" to meet this requirement.
templates.name: How are BigHeads shipped?

templates.content: If you need a reusable standee, be sure to choose our Bubble-X plastic material. All standees made in Bubble-X plastic are highly durable and come with a detachable stand.
templates.name: Can your Standees be set-up and taken down multiple times?

templates.content: The standees are scored, folded, and shipped in a box that will meet UPS size requirements. Upon arrival, you will lay out the standee on a clean surface and fold out the stand.
templates.name: How are Standees shipped?

templates.content:
Absolutely! To have a standee of an old photo made, we recommend scanning the image at a minimum of 300 dpi (dots per inch) or, if possible, higher. Scanners can go as high as 2400 dpi. The higher the better. 

If you don't have a scanner, then you can get images scanned at Walgreens, OfficeMax, Office Depot or Staples for typically less than $2.
templates.name: The photo I want is old and printed out. Can I make it into a standee?

templates.content:
If you would like to repeat a previous order, place a new order with the same image and note the previous order number in the Order Notes. This will ensure it is exactly the same as the previous order.

If you do not have the image file from a previous order, please contact us at info@cardboardcutoutstandees.com and we can help you place a repeat order.
templates.name: I would like to repeat a previous order. What is the best way to do this?

templates.content: Orders placed by 10 a.m. CST on a business day will ship the following business day. If you need rushed production, please let me know and I would be more than happy to check on this with my team for you.
templates.name: Do you offer rush service production?

templates.content: We certainly can pre-screen your images for you. To have us do that, just send us an email to info@cardboardcutoutstandees.com, type PRESCREEN in the subject line, and attach the image(s) in question. If there are any additional questions or concerns about that and/or placing an order, just write them in the body of the email.
templates.name: Can I have my photo reviewed before placing an order?

templates.content: All our sizes work great for graduation.
templates.name: Which sizes work great for graduation?

templates.content: You'll have the option of uploading all photos at once if you're going to order them all with the same size and material.  You can use the "Team Upload" button here: https://www.cardboardcutoutstandees.com/big-head.html and either select all the photos, or you can simply drag and drop them on the screen.
templates.name: I want more than 1 big head, do I have to do separate orders?

templates.content: Yes, we do reproduce celebrities and have even produced a video that shows how to search for high-resolution images: https://youtu.be/kvTQPvkxv-o?si=4LXQGAn0lunDk05T
templates.name: Can you do celebrities / famous people?

templates.content: No, our graphic team will take care of that for you. If you want us to include background just make sure to note it in the "special instructions" when you order. We may have to include some background around the base of the unit to ensure it stands upright.
templates.name: Do I need to remove all the background from my photo before sending it?

templates.content: I'm afraid we don't add grad caps to photos taken without a grad cap, but we would definitely include it if the submitted photo is taken with the subject wearing one!
templates.name: Are you able to add graduation caps?

templates.content: Proofs need to be selected as an option at checkout with standees and decals, and they're provided for free with murals. We don't provide proofs with BigHeads. If you don't select the proof option, our team of professionals still review every photo that is uploaded, and if there are quality concerns, we'll contact you via email.
templates.name: Will I receive a proof before my standee is made?

templates.content: The maximum dimensions of our standees are 9'10" x 4'9".  We can orient your image either portrait or landscape to fit these dimensions. If you want a standee larger than 9'10" x 4'9", contact us in regard to quoting a multi-panel standee.
templates.name: Maximum dimensions of the standee

templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address and the change you'd like to make?
templates.name: Cancel / edit order

templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/cardboardcutoutstandees/ , TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@cardboardcutoutstandees , and FB here: https://web.facebook.com/CardboardCutoutStandees/
templates.name: Social media

templates.content: Our products are made from 1/8" corrugated cardboard, 3/16 inch foamcore, or 3/16 inch Bubble-X plastic.
templates.name: What are the cutouts made of?

templates.content: We offer free economy shipping on all domestic orders. For faster shipping options, costs are calculated based on shipping location and the shipping method you choose.
templates.name: Free shipping

templates.content: Typically when a photo won't upload, the reason is usually due to the size of the file being too small. You can try uploading a larger-sized image.
templates.name: My file/picture won't upload

templates.content: Our standees can be unpackaged and set up in seconds.  Here is a quick video to walk you through the steps: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qQ8uEa3_loc
templates.name: How do I set up my standee?

templates.content: I can definitely check on this for you. Can you let me know the item type, quantity, and size you're looking to get? Can I also have your e-mail address?
templates.name: Bulk Discount (ESC)

templates.content: Our Wall Decals are removable, but are not designed to be reused after removal.
templates.name: Are the wall decals reusable?

templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-844-740-8103 from 8am to 4pm CT or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.
templates.name: Phone support

templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://support.cardboardcutoutstandees.com/support/solutions/articles/69000803374-do-you-offer-refunds
templates.name: Return policy

templates.content: We recommend the face hole be an oval that is 8" tall and 6" wide for adults and 7" tall and 5" wide for children.
templates.name: What's the size of the Face Hole?

templates.content: Thank you for reaching out! It would be best to send the image to our customer support team directly at info@cardboardcutoutstandees.com. One of my colleagues will be more than happy to help out!
templates.name: Customer is trying to send a photo

templates.content: With Bigheads we don't offer editing, we automatically remove the background and select the head.
templates.name: Do you offer editing for BigHeads?

templates.content: The finish is smooth, non-reflective and semi-glossy. We use UV resistant inks that ensure your standee won't fade.
templates.name: What is the finish on the cutouts? Will it fade?

templates.content: We created a video guide that will help you search for high-resolution images. You can check it out here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kvTQPvkxv-o Hope this helps!
templates.name: Where can I find high-resolution images?

templates.content: Selecting the subject and removing the background is a manual process completed by our editors. We do show a thumbnail of the original photo to allow you to ensure you have uploaded the correct photo.
templates.name: Do you have a preview option?

templates.content: We usually ship via UPS and orders placed by 10am on a business day will leave our facility the following business day. We have multiple shipping options available at checkout that can deliver orders in as quickly as 1 business day, check them out here: https://cardboard.attn.tv/sl/2iZ8JIcJ
templates.name: Shipping time

templates.content: Absolutely! You can upload images as BigHeads or standees, and they'll work great as photo props. We've had customers who did this before, and we've had amazing feedback from them.
templates.name: Can I use your products as photo props?

templates.content: We currently don't have a way of enclosing any notes with the shipments, but we don't include our name on the return label. It shows as CCS, so it won't ruin the surprise.
templates.name: Can I add a gift note?

templates.content: Yes, we can, just let us know which person to remove in the "Special Instructions" when you select the height.
templates.name: Can you remove people from the photo?

templates.content: You can check this article out to see how we size BigHeads when someone has long hair or a hat: https://cardboard.attn.tv/sl/9dFGCPlP
templates.name: What if I am wearing a hat or have long hair in my photo?

templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.
templates.name: Store location / retailer

templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at info@cardboardcutoutstandees.com. Our team is happy to chat.
templates.name: Wholesale inquiries

templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at info@cardboardcutoutstandees.com. Our team is happy to chat.
templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship

templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!
templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount

templates.content: Coated cardboard is the standard and best for indoor and moderate handling. If you prefer the highest print quality life-sized stand-up, then I'd recommend the foam core. Lastly, if you want your standee to last longer, especially if you want to use it outside, then I'd recommend Bubble-X plastic. You can find more info here: https://www.cardboardcutoutstandees.com/life-size-options.html#materials
templates.name: Differences between Coated Cardboard, Foam Core, and Corrugated Plastic

templates.content: Our standard is to select the face. There is no need for you to crop the photo. You can upload it and we will just select the face.
templates.name: Can I upload a full body photo for the BigHead?

templates.content: You can take a look at our BigHead pricing here: https://www.cardboardcutoutstandees.com/big-head-pricing.html

templates.content: Please note that with standees you can only upload a single photo. If you want to add more photos, the best way is to upload the main photo and select the editing option. In the entry for what editing you want, please explain what you would like us to do. Once the order is complete you will receive a confirmation email. You should reply to this email and attach the additional photos. Hope this helps!
templates.name: How can I add multiple people?

templates.content: If you want one standee with all five people, simply enter the height of the tallest person for the order and add a note that "height given is for the tallest person on the right". Please note that this would be wider than our standard 45" width. We can do it but would calculate the number of panels required and the additional charge after receiving the order.
templates.name: I want one standee for multiple people in one photo

templates.content: I'd recommend taking a look at this video here: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/oqU5Cf2xWy0 Hope this helps!
templates.name: Can I see examples of the sizing for your BigHeads?

templates.content: Yes, we do! You can check out our 12" Heads here https://www.cardboardcutoutstandees.com/bighead-options.html
templates.name: Do you offer hand fans?

templates.content: Let me check with my team. Please note that we may not be able to respond to you until tomorrow morning but I'll be in touch the moment I get an update!
templates.name: WeekDAYS escalations

templates.content: We do guarantee the delivery dates provided during checkout. Note that delays in responding to follow-up emails, proof emails, etc., do alter the guaranteed date; however, when we do send these, we provide you with a deadline that you need to respond by to keep the originally scheduled date. Additionally, if the product doesn't reach you by the time we quoted during checkout, we will provide a refund.
templates.name: Guarantee delivery dates - Brand Specific

templates.content: Only our 12" BigHeads come with sticks. The 36" and 47" BigHeads come with handles that attach to the back, not sticks. And the 24" doesn't come with a stick or handle.
templates.name: Do the 36" and 24" big heads come with sticks?

templates.content: Due to the size of the image you have sent we are unable to receive it via text. Please email your image and questions to our email team at info@cardboardcutoutstandees.com. They will be able to assist you.
templates.name: Image not coming through

templates.content: We offer UPS Next Day Air Saver, UPS 2-Day Air, and UPS 3-Day Select. We also provide customers with an "Arrives On" estimated delivery date for these shipping methods. Please allow 1-2 business days for production.
templates.name: Do you offer expedited shipping?

templates.content:
Please note the individual upload pricing options displayed per quantity are when the heads are all made from the same image. 

You can see the pricing here: https://www.cardboardcutoutstandees.com/big-head-pricing.html?externalId=X4l4g
templates.name: How does pricing work?

templates.content: Good question! The "special instructions" entry appears just after you upload your image. Let me know if you can find it.
templates.name: Where can I find the 'Special Instructions' section?

templates.content:
Our bubble-x plastic material units come with a stand that's attached with velcro, while the cardboard and foam core are attached with double-sided tape for no extra charge. 

 Though if you'd like, we can make one with a stand that can be removed so the unit can be folded back up and reused - just select the bubble-x plastic material.
templates.name: I don't need a stand! Do you have that option?

templates.content: BigHeads are shipped in boxes based on the size ordered that will meet UPS size requirements. 12-inch and 24-inch Heads will ship flat in a box. 36-inch Heads will be scored in half, and 47-inch Heads will be scored and folded into quads before shipping.
templates.name: How are BigHeads shipped?

templates.content: At the moment, the text customization option is only available for Standees and not for BigHeads.
templates.name: Can I add words/text to my Big Head cutout?

templates.content: We have a built-in discount for teams. Please use the team upload button and upload all of your images at once to receive the team pricing.
templates.name: Do you have team discounts for BigHeads?
